articles.author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
articles.title: Jeff Bezos comes out in support of increased corporate taxes - CNN
articles.description: As the White House considers raising taxes on corporations for the first time in more than 25 years, the head of one of America's largest companies is backing such a plan.

articles.author: Nate Rattner
articles.title: CDC director says hospitalizations among seniors are declining as more than half of the age group is fully vaccinated - CNBC
articles.description: More than half of Americans 65 and older are fully vaccinated, and emergency department visits and hospitalizations associated with that age group are falling.
articles.content: As the U.S. continues to increase the pace of its vaccination campaign, now averaging more than 3 million shots per day, those in the most vulnerable age group are leading the way. About 75% of Ameri… [+2836 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Police, communities across US fight back against anti-Asian hate crimes - Rappler
articles.description: A Center for the Study of Hate and Extremism report shows that while hate crimes overall in the US had fallen slightly in 2020, crimes against Asian Americans and Pacific Islanders had jumped by 145%
articles.content: The officers walked through the arcade of hair and nail salons, restaurants serving Vietnamese cuisine, and herbal medicine shops on Saturday, April 3, talking to business owners and patrons. They th… [+167 chars]
